message_1: How many different combinations of 4 letters can be chosen from the word "MATHS"?
message_2:
To find the number of different combinations of 4 letters from the word "MATHS," we will use the combination formula:

C(n, k) = n! / (k!(n-k)!)

where n is the total number of items (in this case, 5 letters), k is the number of items to be chosen (4 letters), and ! denotes the factorial function (e.g., 5! = 5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1).

C(5, 4) = 5! / (4!(5-4)!)

C(5, 4) = 5! / (4!1!)

C(5, 4) = (5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1) / ((4 × 3 × 2 × 1)(1))

C(5, 4) = 120 / (24 × 1)

C(5, 4) = 120 / 24

C(5, 4) = 5

So, there are 5 different combinations of 4 letters that can be chosen from the word "MATHS."
